title: Lamin Diallo
text:
Lamin Diallo (born 31 August 1991) is a professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="Iraklis%20Psachna%20F.C.">Iraklis Psachna</a>.
International career.
Born in Slovenia to a Guinean father and Slovene mother, Diallo was a youth international for Slovenia. He was called up to the <a href="Guinea%20national%20football%20team">Guinea national football team</a> for a pair of friendlies in November 2017.
